description:
• Developed real-time microservices for a B2B finance platform, focusing on secure payment processing with scalable RESTful APIs in NodeJS and AWS database migration. 
 • Built and integrated a Forex risk management module with real-time UI updates in React.js and efficient local storage using MongoDB. 
 • Created a time-series data pipeline with AWS Timestream to track real-time metrics, improving retrieval speeds by 20% for low-latency data access. 
 • Designed secure RESTful financial APIs for cross-functional teams, handling over 5K daily requests with reliable external system integration.

• Designed distributed backend architectures for scalable, high-availability data systems, reducing processing time by 40%. 
 • Developed Python and C++ algorithms to optimize data pipelines, enhancing speed and memory efficiency. 
 • Architected Apache Kafka data pipelines, boosting data throughput by 25% and reducing processing time by 30%. 
 • Deployed solutions on AWS EC2 to improve service reliability and response times by 15%, enhancing data insights. 
 • Built secure, high-reliability RESTful APIs with Flask, handling 10,000+ daily requests with 99% uptime. 
 • Optimized API performance with Redis caching, reducing response times by 30% on high-traffic endpoints. 
 • Containerized services with Docker, achieving streamlined deployments and efficient monitoring with AWS ECS.

• Developed and optimized an Android application for real estate management, integrating RESTful APIs for improved data communication. 
 • Enhanced application performance, achieving a 25% increase in processing speed and a 20% reduction in memory usage through effective 
 JSON parsing optimizations.
